```{r}
#creating dataset ------------

#loading in variable list
v17 <- load_variables(2017, "acs5", cache = TRUE)

california_2017 <- get_acs(
  geography = "tract",
  variables = c("B01003_001", #total population
                "C17002_001", #income to poverty ratio
                "B99234_001", #allocation of weeks worked in the past 12 months
                "B99233_001", #allocation of usual hours worked per week in the past 12 months 
                "B08133_001", #aggregate travel time to work in minutes
                "B01001_026", #total female
                "B28010_001", #computers in household
                "B99131_001", #allocation of marital status for females
                "B08303_001", #travel time to work
                "B99151_002" #allocation of educational attainment
                ), 
  output = "wide",
  state = "CA",
  year = 2017) # data from years 2013 - 2017

  
	
# B01003_001 = total population
# C17002_001 = income to poverty ratio
# B992518_001 = allocation of gross rent
# B99234_001 = allocation of weeks worked in the past 12 months
# B99233_001 = allocation of usual hours worked per week in the past 12 months
```
